testsuite.name: Date selection in the Datepicker

testcase.name: Select day 15 of the current month
Select day 10 of the next month
Validate that manual input is not allowed

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: The input field should remain empty Expected: "" but: was "12/25/2025"

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: The input field should remain empty Expected: "" but: was "12/25/2025" at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:20) at co.sqasa.StepDef.TestStepDefinition.validateInputFieldRemainsEmpty(TestStepDefinition.java:99) at ✽.the input field should remain empty(src/test/resources/features/test.feature:22)
